metadata.title: CVE-2022-2227 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Improper access control in the runner jobs API in GitLab CE/EE affectingall versions prior to 14.10.5, 15.0 prior to 15.0.4, and 15.1 prior to15.1.1 allows a previous maintainer of a project with a specific runner toaccess job and project meta data under certain conditions

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
